main event: Observers at Misawa AB, Japan reported a shiny, metallic object moving swiftly, making abrupt turns, and disappearing to the southwest.
interesting points: The sighting took place on January 12, 1953, at 1215Z., The object was observed for 2-3 minutes., The observers could not identify the object as a known aircraft or under human control., There was no radar contact made during the sighting., Weather conditions were excellent with clear visibility.
